name: mr-checkbox
description: Validates a value against a given set of requirements.

scripts.test: npm run eslint && npm run mocha
scripts.patch-release: npm test && npm version patch && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.minor-release: npm test && npm version minor && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.major-release: npm test && npm version major && npm publish && git push --follow-tags

author: Ryan Aghdam <ryan@ryanaghdam.com>
